name: DV_EHR_URI
title: DV_EHR_URI
description: A DV_EHR_URI is a DV_URI which has the scheme name 'ehr', and which can only reference items in EHRs. Used to reference items in an EHR, which may be the same as the current EHR (containing this link), or another.

element.short: A DV_EHR_URI is a DV_URI which has the scheme name 'ehr', and which can only reference items in EHRs
element.definition: A DV_EHR_URI is a DV_URI which has the scheme name 'ehr', and which can only reference items in EHRs. Used to reference items in an EHR, which may be the same as the current EHR (containing this link), or another.
